website_summaries.verdict: A quality set, but the design might not be practical for everyone.
pros: Attractive and versatile set that doubles as serving ware
Comes with glass lids for baking and plastic lids for food storage
cons: They are heavy, and must be handled carefully to prevent breakage

customer_reviews.title: My fault for assuming that this was like the one my Mama had that I gave to ...
customer_reviews.text: Found out that this is not the Corning ware my Mother had. Put it on the warming element on my stove to melt some butter and the next sound I heard was it busting. My fault for assuming that this was like the one my Mama had that I gave to my Granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, a bit small
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of bakeware. It's beautiful, easy to clean, and I love that all the pieces have lids. The one downside is they're a bit on the small size. Pay careful attention to the measurements on the description, because I assumed it was the same size as similar sets I'd seen in retail stores. This is the perfect set for side dishes and small servings, but isn't adequate for large portions to feed an entire family. Otherwise, great set and I'm glad I purchased it. Maybe it will help me scale down my portion sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: I hate them. They look beautiful but there is no ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Thanksgiving, serving dishes. I hate them. They look beautiful but there is no handle to get them out of a hot oven, very dangerous. I have had corning wear for 45 years and always loved them. Do not buy. They need to change this design. Something with handles. I'm stuck paying for something that I will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: amberbaily

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well-packed but the large stoneware was broken. They would not replace it unless I returned it; so I returned it and bought it at a brick-and-mortar store. A picture wasn't good enough
customer_reviews.author: Jack Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not Like the Old Corningware
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived and two of four of the small, individual casseroles were broken (no packing material had been placed between the dishes where two were packed together: one of each "stack" was broken in several pieces). The casseroles are not of the old Corningware I grew up with, but seem to be pottery-like. While I liked the price, number, and the size of the casseroles, I wish the old Corningware square casseroles in a box of four was still available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love these dishes
customer_reviews.text: I love this set I was hoping that the 2.5 Qt was the same size of one that was broken years ago is was not, However I do love these just as much. I am using these most of the time. I love the fact that these go from the oven to the table, to fringe, then on to the dishwasher. You just can not beat that. I see that I will be using them for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Styles

customer_reviews.title: Always a hit
customer_reviews.text: I've known I needed a decent set of casserole dishes for a while now, and since we're planning a couple rather large gatherings this fall, I felt it was about time. CorningWare has always been a trusted brand in my family, and you can't go wrong with 17 pieces for that price. I could not be more pleased with the set! They've satisfied every need I've had for them since they arrived, and I'm sure they'll continue to do so for many, many, many years to come. :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: bought these as a gift
customer_reviews.text: they are okay, they are nice for entertaining for the holidays and what not. but i find the quality of the product is really sub par. they do not feel nearly as nice as the older stuff if that is what you are looking for. The lids do not fit very well either, the glass or plastic ones. they were alright but not nearly as nice as i wanted them to be since i got them as a gift for someone else, i would not purchase again and would not want a set for myself
customer_reviews.author: deborah

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dishes! I like they came with glass lids and lids to cover them while in fridge!
customer_reviews.author: JT Sully

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 sets as Mother's Day gifts for my daughters. As a child I watched my own mother bake with CorningWare, I am now 64. When I saw this set, I absolutely had to give my girls the experience. They told me how much they love their sets and can't wait to use them.. They were delivered right on time and all in good condition. No broken pieces..
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Corningware French White Bake and serve set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my daughter-in-law for Christmas and when I received it many of the items were broken. I contacted Amazon and they were very helpful in helping me return the item and ship me a new one. The new one arrived within a few days and it seems to be just fine. If the bakeware is like most conringware items I'm sure she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Just the set I needed and I am very very happy with the purchase. Packaged great, delivered fast and great quality. I have used the entire set many times over and not a single issue at all. The small dish containers are absolutely perfect for creme' brulet and the torching has created no problems with the ware at all.
customer_reviews.author: nicky2tone

customer_reviews.title: I like this set a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this set a lot. I banned all plastic storage containers from the kitchen, and wanted something that looked clean and functioned for my needs. This set does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

customer_reviews.title: The item was given as a wedding gift. Unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: The item was given as a wedding gift. Unfortunately it was not opened until after the 30 day return window closed and 2 of the pieces came chipped. Now there is nothing I can do to get my friends a complete set without paying for replacement pieces.
customer_reviews.author: SGH

customer_reviews.title: Grand!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all in one piece! Have not used them yet but think all will be grand!
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dishes, I've used these dishes time an time again...
customer_reviews.author: organizer

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: First shipment had one item broken and I had no trouble returning the shipment and I did so once I received the replacement as they requested. Second shipment was great. Would like to get an even larger one.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieG

customer_reviews.title: dishes
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness these are the best. I love then all sizes to use as needed love the lids and the wire rack to tak out of oven wonderfully used in oven or microwave. I also like the idea from freezer to cooking. Clean up is easy right in the dish washer or hand wash both works great.
customer_reviews.author: Beyonkeeta

customer_reviews.title: Great set and has everything to get you started
customer_reviews.text: Great set and has everything to get you started. Looks great with most dishes due to its universal design. Also matches other single piece Corningware items that you can purchase by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Corning ware is always a great product. However one of the ramekins came badly chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Good basic set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set to start up housekeeping, you get a lot for your money. It has a good variety of shapes and sized, plus a few covers and a to the table carrier.The white color goes with any decor, it would make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lu

customer_reviews.title: this is a good baking set
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good baking set. I have noticed that a few of the pieces have small defects in the finish such as tiny bubbles and what looks like drips in the white coating. These defects don't seem to affect the use, though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set.
customer_reviews.text: One ramikin broken. Not a real heavy duty set but good for most casseroles ect. No Stove top, No Broil, chips easily.
customer_reviews.author: Micknmass

customer_reviews.title: The CorningWare French White cookware is very convenient and cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: The CorningWare French White cookware is very convenient and cuts down on the need for plastic zip locks to store items in the refrigerator. My only complaint is that the cookware does not have handles, making it tricky to remove from the oven or microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wedding Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This CorningWare French White 10-Piece Bakeware Set was purchased for a wedding gift. Well, the bride really likes CorningWare French White bakeware and was very pleased with this particular set. She's happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: CorningWare
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I knew I loved Corning Ware. This was perfect choice. These can be used in oven, freezer, and also a serving dish. And dishwasher safe. Very easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Freda

customer_reviews.title: So worth the purchase!! Absolutely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! I cook my veggies in them. Once I’m done I put the lid on it and put it in my fridge. Love love love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. I use them everyday. I can put them in the oven or in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: A. Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product! This set is very nice for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This set is very nice for a family of 2.We really like that it is easy to store and is equally great for cooking or warm-ups. The tops are also terrific. LJ
customer_reviews.author: L J

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a family member for her birthday. She loves the set and the fact it has interchangeable lids for storage or baking. Shipping took a little over a week to get here but well worth the wait! Beautiful quality set that was packaged great!
customer_reviews.author: Bran H

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was in the need of a new corningware set, and this was in my budget. It has worked great so far my only complaint is that the two smallest containers don't have glass lids.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a covered casserole dish or two and this set meets all my needs for years to come. Not too big, which was the problem with my old dishes (they were enormous!).
customer_reviews.author: West Coast Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cha

customer_reviews.title: CorningWare French White 17-Piece Bake and... CorningWare
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for down sizing your meals to just one or two. Although one was broken I still enjoy the rest of them.
customer_reviews.author: Upinarmsingf

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. But received a broken casserole.
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty standard and good quality. I purchased this product as a gift. However, we received a broken casserole. Needless to say, the return process was very easy. But it was a hassle to return it on behalf of the friends we gifted it to.
customer_reviews.author: smannem

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Corning Ware French White 17-Piece Bake and Serve Set loved it, great wedding gift, the couple loved it thank you much
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Brezny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: The CorningWare French White Bake and Server set is exactly what I expected. It is beautiful and functional. And this set contains everything you'll ever need in the way of bake and server dishes.
customer_reviews.author: efhale

customer_reviews.title: Love the product - Love the seller
customer_reviews.text: The product is CorningWare so there is no doubt is a great product. Most important for this is the seller. I had to have this for a wedding shower and the seller was quick with a response and very accommodating. Wish I would have purchased this same set for myself! Thanks to the seller! Saved me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corning Ware 6022156 French  Bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to our daughter-in-law for Christmas and she loved the set.
customer_reviews.author: Morris

customer_reviews.title: seemed like they were from two different sets
customer_reviews.text: The glass lid did not fit the dish, seemed like they were from two different sets.
customer_reviews.author: sudip

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This arrived broken. Horrible packaging. Also made in China not U.S. Had to send back for refund
customer_reviews.author: p j woods

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but difficult to handle coming out of a hot oven because there is type of handle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Patrick

customer_reviews.title: One piece was broken and I didn't want to return ...
customer_reviews.text: One piece was broken and I didn't want to return the whole set just to replace one dish. You could have offered to just replace the broken item. The credit you gave was not enough to cover the cost I had to pay to re-buy the broken item.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C. Braun

customer_reviews.title: corning white casserole dishes
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Perfect assortment for those just starting out. I like the idea of having casserole lids as well as storage lids in the set.
customer_reviews.author: k. griffieth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken by the time I received the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wedding shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding shower gift. I thought that the price was good for a 14 piece set. I did not open the box. I love the french white Corningware products.
customer_reviews.author: Netty

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: bought this set as a gift for my mother and shes always been a fan of corningware. this set was the perfect gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Elephants

customer_reviews.title: needs better packing
customer_reviews.text: While the set is very nice looking it arrived with one of the dishes broken.
customer_reviews.author: A.W. Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with some CorningWare! Bought this as a present for my mom. She loves it. Quality of product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mounger Fam

customer_reviews.title: Missed my favorite cookware
customer_reviews.text: My dog knocked over the shelf where I kept my Corningware and the two large pieces that used almost every day were broken. I found th replacement set on Amazon for a very good price and was so pleased when I recieved them. They really are a staple in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: D. Willard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely set of kitchenware. I was warned that this Corning Ware wasn't as sturdy as the older Corning Ware but I have been really impressed with all of the pieces. We use them a lot (3 kids)and run them through the dishwasher over and over. They have stayed looking nice and fresh. The sizes are really convenient and the lids work really well. We found this to be a very practical and attractive set. It was also well priced! A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and have not heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Canova1954

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this as a housewarming gift for my co-worker. This is a great staple for newlyweds or people just starting out on their own. This was a great deal on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: hikingblondie

customer_reviews.title: CorningWare French White 12-Piece Bake & Serve Set
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I really do not care if this is "the real" Corningware or not. I bought this set to add to one I bought when I first moved to the US 10 years ago. I really only use them as serving dishes, for keeping things warm in the oven prior to serving, and, occasionally, in the oven for casseroles/stuffing etc. They are sturdy, look attractive, and clean up easily. They are perfect for my needs. The End.
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoCaroline

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend or buy this product again. We are extremely happy with it. I cannot find a cheaper price elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend or buy this product again. We are extremely happy with it. I cannot find a cheaper price elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Maraca Anomrac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, been looking for it, great for baking too
customer_reviews.author: Nas Shariff

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: One of the oval bowls was broken into many pieces. I was disappointed in the packaging. I've used Corning ware for years and am sorry not to have the second smallest oval.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryle

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product works well but scratches easy. Cleans good. Lids are nice and tight. Shipping was great as well. All in all great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by ME

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it!!!!!!!!!!! She is expecting her first baby and she was looking to cook a lot of food but had no product to cook it in.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bird

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for everything we needed to cook with. It had all the sizes we needed. It is real easy to cleans up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it was 34 bucks with free super-saver shipping. I was like, what do I have to loose? Great price! It arrived VERY quickly but to my dismay, two pieces (both 2.5 qt containers) were broken! I called corningware and explained to them what happened. They quickly sent via Fed-Ex 2 replacement pieces. Overall, it still was a great buy and I am VERY happy!
customer_reviews.author: ReeRee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these for gifts, one of which I haven't given yet;. Corning Ware is an excellent product. Pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Eldred

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set as a gift for Christmas. I needed the pieces for a party which I was catering. When I opened the box, one of the pieces was shattered! The piece on the top was fine and the piece below was not damaged. I did not bother to return it as I was going on vacation and did not want to stand in line for the return. I just accepted the loss! In spite of the broken piece--it was a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Barksdale

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These dishes are fantastic, and the assortment included covers so many different possible needs. I love it! I do wish that the glass lids fit a little bit better, but that's just me being a bit of a perfectionist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be worse.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get what I expected. Some of the ware seems oval shaped in photo but I received all round. They are smaller than I thought. Gave three stars because the purchase is not a total loss. Could be worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought two! They are good quality as expected! Def would recommend to anyone. Good buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a good buy, I deffently will buy this product again in the future if need arises or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Plastic lids
customer_reviews.text: CorningWare met my expectations. Only issue is the plastic covers did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Ware
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all broken up. It was replaced before I could return it. Second shipment arrived OK. Great service, great product!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Ponder

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered this item twice and twice it came ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item twice and twice it came with the middle bowl broken. I just ordered it again, but this time from Bed Bath and Beyond. If it comes broken from them, I am going to order something completely different.
customer_reviews.author: James Terragnoli

customer_reviews.title: I always dreamed for corning ware and first time purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: I always dreamed for corning ware and first time purchasing one.but the one I received had a crack or manufacture defect inside one of the bowls.I didn't want it to break on use. So I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: fremil

customer_reviews.title: Love this Corningware set!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned a set like this one for many years. Only sad part is they hadn't added the plastic lids for refrigerator use when we got ours. We love them and use them all the time. They have held up beautifully as we use them mainly for baking. I think the price is fair and the product is as good as the old square Corningware dishes. No problems with breakage or chipping. Just wish the extra lids would have been available. Ordering a set today for some newly-weds we know!
customer_reviews.author: Terriby

customer_reviews.title: Smashed to smithereens
customer_reviews.text: Not really fair to give one star, as the product is great....but it was smashed into a million pieces when I received it. Sending back. when I get the new ones, will give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: melreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Corningware French White 12 piece Bake and Serve Set
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for someone who wanted her baking and serving dishes matching. She was pleased with the design, sizes and shapes of the assortment. Amazon delivered extremely quickly and well packed as usual. Corning had the set vey well packed, too.
customer_reviews.author: Historical Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: French corningware set
customer_reviews.text: This set is great and for the price it is well worth buying!!! Looks great on the table and matches with everything. Best part no BPA worries!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed when i recieved my order. Everything was a lot smaller then i expected and it definately wasn't worth the price. I'd return it but everything was so tightly packed together i couldnt even get the box closed again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: HELPS FINISH OUT A SET.
customer_reviews.text: IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!! IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!! IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!! IT DOES EVERYTHING IS SUPPOSE TO AND MORE!!!
customer_reviews.author: FREDERICK C. TIMMEL

customer_reviews.title: Corning Wear
customer_reviews.text: THis product arrived in the oringal box, not inside a bigger box with padding. So of course there were broken pieces. The company had no replacement, so i sent it back for a refund. Didn't get the refund after a whole week, had to contact amazon and cooking.com to ask where the refund was, still haven't gotten it...... Wont order things from Cooking.com again.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Looks great on the table.
customer_reviews.text: Nice though i wished i had paid attention to the sizes more. I needed something bigger. But I added this to my already growing collection of white corningware. Goes from oven to table looking fantastic. Has lids to store in fridge. Love the lids. The smallest one was used for the cranberry sauce. I don't make alot.
customer_reviews.author: Mamacita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: This set i beautiful and never had a issue with mine I've had my set for over 5 years and work great but be careful if you drop 1 it breaks into a million pieces
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mom. She is still using them seven years later as her favorite dishes to bake in.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: Use the in a daily basic for microwave and oven. Have had them for years! still looks like new. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: love them, and they're hard to find!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for baking dishes that aren't circular and have plastic as well as glass lids. I was so happy to find these. I've had them for almost a year and they are still working great. I use the smallest dish to put in my lunchbox way more often than i expected i would.
customer_reviews.author: Jewlery Fan

customer_reviews.title: Corningware for Life
customer_reviews.text: I have had Corningware bakeware that I received as a wedding gift nearly 13 years ago. It was as good today as the first day I used it. Unfortunately one of my children didn't handle it well and it was broken. I bought this set to replace it and it as nice in quality as the first. Thank you to the seller for having this product at such a wonderful price and for sending it packed so well and getting here quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Goldie1201

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in about a dozen broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: The 21/2 dish arrived in about a dozen Birkenhead pieces. I needed a few more casserole baking/serving dishes. I have a set and used them for years. Since I will be doing lots of holiday cooking, decided to order this. Now the hassle of returning it and a trip to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love that CorningWare.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of CorningWare anyway and these are beautiful to take to the frequent church suppers and functions. There is quite a variety of sizes and most have lids as well. They are easy to clean up afterwards and my only wish is that they would come back out with the original that could be used on the stovetop. I surely do miss those!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set but beware of possible breakages in the large pot in the middle of the box. They are not wrapped securely enough!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! My only issue was one small Ramekin was broken in the center of a larger bowl in the middle of the box. The small Ramekin were not wrapped very well and was in tiny little pieces. I was not going to ship the whole package back because of one small Ramekin. Other than that, they are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Corning ware set
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this has four stars rather than five is that it arrived with one piece broken. Otherwise, it had the quality one would expect of Corning white-ware. Of course Amazon customer service were right there to work with us on the broken piece and within a couple of days we were hole. The set arrived on time as we have come to expect with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: ... expected set with server rack but it was in perfect conditioned and well wrapped when it
customer_reviews.text: This did not come as the expected set with server rack but it was in perfect conditioned and well wrapped when it came
customer_reviews.author: Momof3. #notimetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts and  we love the ones we have!
customer_reviews.text: For a wedding gift-but we have same style and love em!
customer_reviews.author: John McCumber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dishes and go with just about any kind of dishes.
customer_reviews.author: IslandGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I have given this set many times as a wedding gift with great results. The classic design is one with which everyone is familiar and compliments newlyweds registered cookware patterns which, unfortunately on a retired person's income, I am unable to afford. This is a nice starter set, inexpensive to replace by the piece if breakage should happen, and helps the married couple if their designer cookware desires were unmet after the fact. It has always elicted a very heartfelt thank you note.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pietkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a colleague who was really a true friend while in nursing school, helped out with tutoring and making med surg easy to understand with her patience and ever ready gesture to explain things to me and others that benefited from her. Im sure she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Turton Adeyemo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for what I paid
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in one piece. Not bad for what I paid. Of course it's not real Corning Ware... it's stone ware. Real Corning is virtually unbreakable. This will break fairly easy. But real Corning would be much more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Great dishes with lids. Just what I was looking for. Dishes arrived quickly and were well packaged to avoid any possible breaks. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Parker!

customer_reviews.title: I love this bakingware
customer_reviews.text: I bougth this set in replacement for my old ones, which I had to leave in a moving. I really missed my corningware because is very practical. You can cook, bake and even use them to serve meals. I looked around a couple of days for a good combination of sizes and price and I think this is the one, you have a size for every need you have.
customer_reviews.author: Verónica Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Love CorningWare
customer_reviews.text: I got these for myself (bought a larger set for my sister-in-law at Christmas) as mine seemed to have disappeared (left/forgotten at friend's and/or family's homes. I love the classic white as it always looks nice on your table.
customer_reviews.author: Cile

customer_reviews.title: Lovely as always, with storage lids!
customer_reviews.text: Traditional Corning casseroles. Lovely as always. Plastic storage lids are a great addition to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Momacist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This 17-piece set has EVERYTHING. I have used every piece in the short time that I've owned it. The lids all fit nicely, many of the pieces stack together, making storage easy. I love the fact that it is simple and white and goes with all my other dishes!
customer_reviews.author: debikan.

customer_reviews.title: Too many small items
customer_reviews.text: Like the Corningware. But I wanted more large serving pieces. I have no need for the small items. I went to Walmart to purchase the larger size serving ware.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

product_meta.title: CorningWare French 10-Piece Bakeware Set, White
product_meta.description: Size:10 pieceThe recipe for a great dish starts, surprisingly, with a great dish! CorningWare French White bakeware proves that when it comes to food preparation, few things are more convenient than baking and serving in one dish. With its classic, fluted design, French White oven-to-table bakeware imparts a traditional elegance that is a perfect complement to any decor. Versatile yet stylish, CorningWare French White is simple...from start to finish! 10-pc set includes one each: 2.5-qt round with glass and plastic covers, 1.5-qt round with glass and plastic covers, 16-oz round with plastic cover and two 4-oz ramekins / Stoneware is safe to use in microwave, oven, refrigerator, freezer & dishwasher / Resists chipping and cracking / Non-porous surface does not absorb food odors, flavors or stains / 1 Year Limited Warranty on Corningware Stoneware Bakeware.
feature_bullets: 10-pc set includes one each: 2.5-qt round with glass and plastic covers, 1.5-qt round with glass and plastic covers, 16-oz round with plastic cover and two 4-oz ramekins
Stoneware is safe to use in microwave, oven, refrigerator, freezer & dishwasher
Non-porous surface does not absorb food odors, flavors or stains
Glass and plastic lids make cooking, serving and storing easy and convenient
